column4: Hi, im back with another problem, when i click run from usb device (on the boot menu frommy usb device) it says missing live files or something after an ubuntu loading screen.
Hi, im back with another problem, when i click run from usb device (on the boot menu frommy usb device) it says missing live files or something after an ubuntu loading screen.
patience is a virtue.  Ask once, and wait longer before re-asking.  I'd say 15minutes or so.
